knimeNode.name: XLS Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Saves a datatable into a spreadsheet.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes out the datatable coming through its input port into a spreadsheet of a workbook. The files can be read then with other applications like Microsoft Excel, for example.
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file name. You can also choose a previously selected file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.
If checked, the column names will be written out in the first row of the spreadsheet.
If checked, the row IDs will be added to the output, in the first colum of the spreadsheet.
Enter a pattern that will be set for missing data values. If not specified, the corresponding datacell of the spreadsheet will stay empty.
